channel.title: Temps on Data Science Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Temps on Data Science Notes

item.title: Job-search
item.description: Section 1: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and the New Job Hunting Landscape hopefully doing work that we enjoy and we find it meaningful and some opportunities for some advancements We are going to work on: Identifying your big six skills Building an excellent resume LinkedIn Profile and cover letter Building technology into your job research your interviewing skills Networking on the job hunt Negotiating your salary Section 2: Resumes in a World of AI and Applicant Tracking Systems (ATSs) Applicant Tracking System (ATS): Software package used by companies to recieve, analyze, and tracking incoming candidates.
